name: Firefox 右键菜单精简
description: 把页面右键不常用的删掉了。请酌情使用。
css:
/*================去掉右键菜单中的选项:adbilok plus*/
#contentAreaContextMenu>menuitem[id^="abp-"],
#contentAreaContextMenu > .abp-contextmenuitem /*过滤图片*/
  {display: none !important;}
/*================*/
#frame,/* "本帧" */
#spell-check-enabled,/*拼写检查*/
#QBK-RightMueu-Post,/*收藏到QQ书签*/

/* =============== 去掉右键菜单中的选项:网页 */
#context-back, /* "后退" */
#context-forward, /* "前进" */
#context-reload, /* "刷新" */
#context-stop, /* "停止" */
#context-sep-stop, /* "停止"下面的分隔符" */
#context-bookmarkpage, /* "加入收藏夹..." */
#context-savepage, /* "网页另存为..." */
#context-sendpage, /* "发送链接..." */
#context-sep-viewbgimage, /* "查看背景图片"上面的分隔符 */
/* #context-viewbgimage, /* "查看背景图片" */


/* =============== 去掉右键菜单中的选项:链接 */
#context-openlink, /* "在新窗口中打开" */
#context-openlinkintab, /*"在新标签中打开链接" */
#context-sep-open, /* "在新标签中打开链接" 下面的分隔符 */
#context-bookmarklink, /* "加入收藏夹..." */
/*#context-savelink, /* "链接另存为..." */
#context-sendlink, /* "发送链接..." */
#context-copyemail, /* "复制Email地址" */
/*#context-copylink, "复制链接" */
#context-sep-copylink, /* 链接下面的分隔符*/


/* =============== 去掉右键菜单中的选项:图片 */
/*#context-viewimage,  "查看图片" */
/*#context-copyimage-contents, "复制图片" */
/*#context-copyimage,  "复制图片地址" */
/* #context-sep-copyimage,"复制图片地址"下面的分隔符 */
/*#context-saveimage,  "图片另存为..." */
#context-sendimage, /* "发送图片..." */
#context-setWallpaper,
#context-setDesktopBackground, /* "设为桌面壁纸..." */
#context-blockimage, /* "阻止图片" */
#context-viewimageinfo,/* "查看图片信息" */

/* =============== 去掉右键菜单中的选项:文字 */
#context-undo, /* "撤销" */
#context-sep-undo, /* "撤销"下的分隔符 */
#context-cut, /* "剪切 */
/* #context-copy,"复制" */
/* #context-paste,  "粘贴" */
/* #context-delete, "删除" */
#context-sep-paste, /*"删除" 下面的分隔符 */
/*#context-selectall,  "全选" */
#context-sep-selectall, /*"全选"下面的分隔符 */
/*#context-searchselect,  "搜索..." */
/* #context-viewpartialsource-selection, "查看源文件" */
#context-keywordfield, /* "为搜索加入关键词..." */

/* =============== 去掉右键菜单中的选项:其它 */
#context-viewpartialsource-mathml,  /*"View MathML Source" */
#context-sep-properties, /* "属性"上面的分隔符 */
#context-viewsource, /* "查看源文件" */
#context-sep-viewsource,/* "查看源文件"上面的分隔符 */
#context-viewinfo, /* "查看页面信息" */
#context-metadata, /* "属性" */
#context-viewpartialsource-selection  /*查看选中部分源代码*/
{ display: none !important; }

/* =============== 去掉右键菜单的"撤销关闭标签" */
#sep-undoclosetab,
#undoclosetab,
#context-sep-undoclosetab,
#context-undoclosetab
{ display: none !important; }

/* =============== 去掉右键菜单中的选项:书签 */
#bookmarks-context-menu menuitem[label="Expand"],
#bookmarks-context-menu menuitem[label="Open in Tabs"],
#bookmarks-context-menu menuitem[label="Manage Folder"],
#bookmarks-context-menu menuitem[label="Manage Folder"] + menuseparator,
#bookmarks-context-menu menuitem[label="Open"],
#bookmarks-context-menu menuitem[label="Open in New Window"],
#bookmarks-context-menu menuitem[label="Open in New Tab"],
#bookmarks-context-menu menuitem[label="Open in New Tab"] + menuseparator,
#bookmarks-context-menu menuitem[label="New Bookmark..."],
#bookmarks-context-menu menuitem[label="New Folder..."],
#bookmarks-context-menu menuitem[label="New Separator"],
#bookmarks-context-menu menuitem[label="New Separator"] + menuseparator,
#bookmarks-context-menu menuitem[label="Cut"],
#bookmarks-context-menu menuitem[label="Copy"],
#bookmarks-context-menu menuitem[label="Paste"],
#bookmarks-context-menu menuitem[label="Paste"] + menuseparator,
#bookmarks-context-menu menuitem[label="Properties"] + menuseparator
{ display: none; }

/* =============== 去掉右键菜单中的选项: 工具栏 */
#toolbar-context-menu menuitem[label="Navigation Toolbar"],
#toolbar-context-menu menuitem[label="Bookmarks Toolbar"] + menuseparator
{ display: none; }

/* =============== 去掉右键菜单中的选项: 扩展管理 */
#extensionContextMenu #menuitem_options_clone, /* "设置" */
#extensionContextMenu #menuitem_homepage_clone, /* "浏览主页" */
#extensionContextMenu #menuitem_about_clone, /* "关于 ..." */
#extensionContextMenu #menuseparator_1_clone, /* "关于 ..."下的分隔符 */
#extensionContextMenu #menuitem_uninstall_clone, /* "卸载" */
#extensionContextMenu #menuitem_update_clone, /* "更新" */
#extensionContextMenu #menuitem_enable_clone, /* "启用" */
#extensionContextMenu #menuitem_disable_clone, /* "禁用" */
#extensionContextMenu #menuseparator_2_clone, /* "移动到最上面" 上的文件夹 */
#extensionContextMenu #menuitem_moveTop_clone, /* "移动到最上面" */
#extensionContextMenu #menuitem_moveUp_clone, /* "向上移动" */
#extensionContextMenu #menuitem_moveDn_clone /* "向下移动" */
{ display:none !important; }
